name: brawlABBadEndingObjects
description:
Modified Antagarich Burning objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Grand Conflux: defended by 1-2 Conflagration Elementals, 1-2 Fulmination Elementals, 1-2 Glaciation Elementals and 1-2 Pollutors, in total 4-5 Elementals in 4 stacks, reward: 3-5 of each Rare Resource, Major Artifact and usually a Treasure Artifact.
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板恩格塔瑞燃烧小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版恩格塔瑞燃烧模组物件，适用于小型地图。
大汇流点宝屋：由1-2只炽火元素、1-2只雷暴元素、1-2只冰核元素和1-2只腐殖元素守护，总共4-5只元素分为4组。击败它们后，玩家将获得每种稀有资源3-5个，必出一件高级宝物，80%概率再得到一件低级宝物。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都有50%机会被升级。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
这些物件不是设计来让你用全部兵力去攻打的，而是让你分散成多支小股部队同时攻打多处地点。
